## BigNumber.isPositive() method

Returns `true` if the value of this BigNumber is positive, otherwise returns `false`<!-- -->.

```ts
x = new BigNumber(-0)
x.isPositive()                  // false
y = new BigNumber(2)
y.isPositive()                  // true
```

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isPositive(): boolean;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
